## Properties

| Property   | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                                                | Type                                                                                                           | Default     |
| ---------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |

| `labels`   | --        | See the Chart.js documentation for [Category Cartesian Axis](https://www.chartjs.org/docs/2.7.3/axes/cartesian/category.html#category-cartesian-axis).                                     | `(string \| string[])[]`                                                                                       | `[]`        |
| `options`  | --        | See the Chart.js documentation for [Global Configuration](https://www.chartjs.org/docs/2.7.3/configuration/) and for your chosen [chart type](https://www.chartjs.org/docs/2.7.3/charts/). | `ChartOptions`                                                                                                 | `{}`        |
